org.gbif.checklistbank.service.mybatis.postgres

Class DatabaseDrivenChecklistBankTestRule<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.test.DatabaseDrivenTestRule<T>
      • org.gbif.checklistbank.service.mybatis.postgres.DatabaseDrivenChecklistBankTestRule<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class of the service you need for this test. This is initialized using Guice and backed by a database as specified in the properties provided.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class DatabaseDrivenChecklistBankTestRule<T>
extends org.gbif.test.DatabaseDrivenTestRule<T>
    Provides a JUnit TestRule to allow database driven integration tests in ChecklistBank. You need to add this rule to each of your tests where you want to use it. One example on the usage: 
     {@code
